mapper.update:
UPDATE `user_info` SET
`open_id` = #{set.openId},
`name` = #{set.name},
`yn` = #{set.yn},
`constellation` = #{set.constellation},
`birthday` = #{set.birthday},
`education` = #{set.education},
`sex` = #{set.sex},
`province` = #{set.province},
`city` = #{set.city},
`hobby` = #{set.hobby},
`height` = #{set.height},
`weight` = #{set.weight},
`self_evaluation` = #{set.selfEvaluation},
`work_area` = #{set.workArea},
`want_say` = #{set.wantSay},
`family` = #{set.family},
`stand_friend` = #{set.standFriend},
`photos` = #{set.photos},
`department` = #{set.department},
`status` = #{set.status},
`reject_reason` = #{set.rejectReason},
`dongdong` = #{set.dongdong},
`wx_number` = #{set.wxNumber},
`create` = #{set.create},
`modified` = #{set.modified},
`ext` = #{set.ext},
`doing_tags` = #{set.doingTags},
`plan_tags` = #{set.planTags},
`activity_tags` = #{set.activityTags},
`id` in

`id` >= #{where.idSt} and
